synopsis.text: It's a heartwarming tale set half a year before the grand opening of La Soleil, a patisserie run by Kashou and his adorable catgirls. The story revolves around Chocola and Vanilla, two kittens new to the Minazuki household, as they navigate their way through a world full of older catgirls. As they grow and learn from their fellow feline friends, they begin to form a special bond with Kashou, whom they affectionately call 'master.' With Christmas just around the corner, the family prepares for a festive celebration, marking the first of many cherished memories together.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
